TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SoapExtensionAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public MustInherit Class SoapExtensionAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SoapExtensionAttribute abstract : Attribute

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，指定 SOAP 扩展应该与 XML Web services 方法一起运行。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, specifies a SOAP extension should run with an XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 ASP.NET 创建的 XML Web 服务方法可以配置为通过将属性应用到 XML Web 服务方法使用 SOAP 扩展运行。XML Web service methods created using ASP.NET can be configured to run with a SOAP extension by applying an attribute to the XML Web service method. 在自定义扩展属性添加到 XML Web 服务方法或客户端代理类的方法，ASP.NET 将在适当时间调用关联的扩展。When a custom extension attribute is added to an XML Web service method or a method on a client proxy class, ASP.NET invokes the associated extension at the appropriate time. 扩展特性是派生自的自定义特性类。An extension attribute is a custom attribute class deriving from . 派生的属性必须重写属性以返回与属性关联的扩展的类型。Derived attributes must override the property to return the type of extension that is associated with the attribute. ## Examples 以下`TraceExtensionAttribute`类派生自以支持将特性应用于 XML Web 服务方法或 XML Web 服务客户端代理类中的方法。The following `TraceExtensionAttribute` class derives from to support applying the attribute to an XML Web service method or a method in an XML Web service client proxy class. 当应用于，`TraceExtension`方法使用的 SOAP 扩展运行。When applied to either, the `TraceExtension` SOAP extension runs with the method. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapExtensionAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtensionAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapExtensionAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtensionAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapExtensionAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtensionAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的类必须重写属性返回的 SOAP 扩展的类型。Derived classes must override the property to return the type of the SOAP extension. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是典型实现属性。The following code example is a typical implementation of the property. summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写时，获取或设置 SOAP 扩展的优先级。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets or set the priority of the SOAP extension.
The priority of the SOAP extension.
